neuro is stubborn: Neuro is stubborn and cannot be convinced to buy or not buy something
neuro doesn't want product suggested: Neuro doesn't want the product suggested
neuro insults filian: Neuro insults Filian in some way, at any point
neuro threatens and/or shoots filian: Neuro threatens Filian, or just shoots her
neuro insults vedal: Neuro insults Vedal in some wy, at any point
neuro threatens and/or shoots vedal: Neuro threatens Vedal, or just shoots her
neuro insults product suggested: Neuro specifically insults one of the products suggested (calling it stupid, ugly, a waste of money, etc)
neuro mentions evil: Neuro mentions Evil, her sister, at any point without prompting from anyone / anything
neuro does a flip: Neuro does a flip! Bonus points if Filian does one too
